name: Hyper Ball
description:
Hyper Ball is a hyper active game designed for iOS and Android mobiles.  

Your hyper active ball has to make through debris. You have impulse to blast your way through but avoid bomb debris. 

Your goal is to cross your maximum speed and reach a maximum distance with no health pickups.

Controls:

  • 1) Touch to boost up
  • 2) Click Impulse button to blast through debris

It is a prototype of the game portraying its basic concepts.

The release version will have updated graphics, sounds and other aesthetics. 

I am more of a programmer than a designer. If anyone who is good at game design, want to work on this project, I am happy to team up.You can leave you comment here or email me at info.developerlabs@gmail.com

If you like the concept, you can support the game by donating.  Anyone who donates will get the full version of the game for free, and if you donate more than $5 before 15 November 2018, your profile/ twitter handle will get a permanent spot on the game's landing page.
